remarks: This is the proof for equation *(7) in [Juillerat] p. 12.  The proven equality will lead to a contradiction, because the left-hand side goes to ` 0 ` for large ` P ` , but the right-hand side is a non-zero integer.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

etransclem46.l $e |- L = sum_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ( ( A ` j ) x. ( _e ^c j ) ) x. S. ( 0 (,) j ) ( ( _e ^c -u x ) x. ( F ` x ) ) _d x ) $.

etransclem46.h $e |- O = ( x e. ( 0 [,] j ) |-> -u ( ( _e ^c -u x ) x. ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
etransclem46 $p |- ( ph -> ( L / ( ! ` ( P - 1 ) ) ) = ( -u sum_ k e. ( ( 0 ... M ) X. ( 0 ... R ) ) ( ( A ` ( 1st ` k ) ) x. ( ( ( RR Dn F ) ` ( 2nd ` k ) ) ` ( 1st ` k ) ) ) / ( ! ` ( P - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
